description.2: A single tile directly in front of the user.
description.3: Two tiles in a column in front of the user.
description.4: Three tiles in a column in front of the user.
description.5: The four tiles adjacent to the user.
description.6: Eight tiles in a ring around the user.
description.7: Three tiles in a line centered directly in front of the user.
description.8: Three tiles in the shape of a chevron (^), with the apex two tiles in front of the user.
description.9: Five tiles in a plus shape centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.10: Five tiles in an X shape centered directly in front of the user.
description.11: A single tile two tiles in front of the user.
description.12: A single tile three tiles in front of the user.
description.13: Four tiles in a diamond centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.14: Eight tiles in a ring centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.15: Three tiles in a line centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.16: Six tiles in two rows of three, one centered two tiles in front of the user and the other three tiles.
description.17: A column of two tiles starting two tiles in front of the user.
description.18: Five tiles in an X shape centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.19: Seven tiles in the shape of the kanji å¤§ (dai), consisting of five squares in a plus shape in front of the user and one square on either side of the user.
description.20: Four tiles in the shape of a T, consisting of the tile directly in front of the user and a row of three tiles centered two tiles in front of the user.
description.21: Six tiles in two rows of three, one centered directly in front of the user and the other two tiles in front of the user.
